name: Reminiscence (Curtis Pelissier, Tiffanny Marzo, Quentin ENJALRIC)
name_original: Reminiscence (Curtis Pelissier, Tiffanny Marzo, Quentin ENJALRIC)
description:
Reminiscence is a puzzle-platformer game. Dive into your memories and find yourself...

Controls

I highly recommend to play with an gamepad controller. Game inputs was designed for this device. (Tested on 360 and Series controllrs )

Gamepad
  • Left Joystick : Move
  • Left Joystick Up : Enter in the door  (a big square light)
  • X : Use pickaxe (level 2 & 3)
  • Press long B : Use torch (level 3)
  • Press short B : Turn off torch (level 3)
Keyboard
  • Q/A/Left Arrow : Move Left
  • D/Right Arrow : Move Right
  • Z/W/Up Arrow : Enter in the door (a big square light)
  • Left Shift/Left click : Use pickaxe (level 2 & 3)
  • Long Spacebar / Long Right click : Use torch (level 3)
  • Short Spacebar / Short right click : Turn off torch (level 3)
Credits
  • Code & Music : Curtis “Rewar” Pelissier
  • Art : Tiffanny “Zeias” Marzo
  • Game Design : Quentin “Thaunter” Enjalric
Changelog (post jam) - QWERTY inputs - Correction of the fire SFX that wasn't correctly spatialized
